Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_mz0a47EYLk1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>*** <iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/cQTKIWMWhAo" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>In <strong>hab136</strong>'s <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61238-AutoAsparagus-v0-2"><strong>AutoAsparagus v0.3</strong></a>, you get all that tasty asparagus goodness without the tedium. With or without existing fuel lines, this plugin will create/arrange fuel lines and stage decouplers/sepratrons as they should be. All of this, and a simple to use, yet highly effective toolbar can be found in <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61238-AutoAsparagus-v0-2"><strong>AutoAsparagus v0.3</strong></a>.</p>
Brilliant. I was useless at asparagus staging and could barely launch anything big with my launch stage!

Awesome! Will save a bit of time during construction. Thanks!

ttb
The perfect solution! Now my laziness can circumvent the tedium of building the launch vehicle too!
